sentences.sContent: Oil is a globally traded and fully fungible commodity making it difficult for a producer to reliably cut off a customer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Oil is a globally traded and fully fungible commodity making it difficult for a producer to reliably cut off a customer.
sentences.sCn: 石油是全球交易、并完全可替代的大宗商品，产油国很难有效孤立某一家顾客。

sentences.sContent: Where the depository keeps any other fungible item it may return any item of the same type quality and quantity in accordance with the contract.
sentences.sContent_eng: Where the depository keeps any other fungible item it may return any item of the same type quality and quantity in accordance with the contract.
sentences.sCn: 保管其他可替代物的，可以按照约定返还相同种类、品质、数量的物品。

sentences.sContent: Goods which are not fungible shall be deemed fungible for the purposes of this act to the extent that under a particular agreement or document unlike units are treated as equivalents.
sentences.sContent_eng: Goods which are not fungible shall be deemed fungible for the purposes of this act to the extent that under a particular agreement or document unlike units are treated as equivalents.
sentences.sCn: 为本法的目的，并使在一项特定协议或档中的不相似单位也可被视为相等物，则非可替代货物应被视为可替代的。
